page.title: 04WOMEN'S INSTITUTE
page.content: Aberangell is fortunate to have a Village Hall which used to be the Village School. There is a Village Hall Committee that supervises its use The main users are W.I. & to a lesser degree the 2 chapels. The W.I. is English speaking & has members living in Machynlleth, Cemmaes Road, Cemmaes & Dinas Mawddwy; meetings are monthly averaging an attendance of 20 members. Each meeting is split into 3; business speaker & refreshments.Talks this year have dealt with Family Trees, Cookery, Animal protection, Food Allergies, visiting China, making Corn Dollies, St.Johns Ambulance, Antiques, Jewellery & a quiz. The W.I. try to arrange a visit to old peoples homes, a coffee evening & a charity stall in Machynlleth The village organises a Christmas party each year.
